text: Salamanca (Otomi: Xidoo "Place of Tepetate") is a city in the Mexican state of Guanajuato. ==Other websites== *Presidencia Municipal de Salamanca Official website Category:Cities in Mexico Category:Settlements in Guanajuato (state) Category:Municipality seats in Guanajuato (state)
title: Salamanca, Guanajuato
